data.name: Age
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's age in years.

data.name: Author
data.comment: Dashboard prompt for entering a book author

data.name: Authorization Code
data.comment: A code used to grant more privileges to an administrative user

data.name: Branch
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's library branch from a drop-down list, examples might be 'Aguila Library' or 'Mesquite Library' or 'Sunset Library'

data.name: Challenges
data.comment: Navigation bar link to Challenges

data.name: Charter School
data.comment: A school type - charter school

data.name: Confirm New Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant to enter their new password again to ensure they did not make a typo.

data.name: Confirm Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant to enter their password again to ensure they did not make a typo.

data.name: Could not create your account: {0}
data.value: No se pudo crear su cuenta: {0}
data.comment: Error creating the participant's account, {0} is replaced with the explanation as to why

data.name: Could not find username '{0}'.
data.value: No se pudo encontrar el nombre du usuario '{0}'.
data.comment: Could not find a username when a participant is trying to authenticate.

data.name: DashboardSecretCodeExplanation
data.value: Los códigos secretos se pueden encontrar asistiendo a los eventos de la biblioteca y en los materiales promocionales. ¡Si encuentras uno, ingrésalo a continuación!
data.comment: Dashboard explanation of what secret codes are

data.name: Email Address
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's email address

data.name: Email and Phone Number are not required however at least one is needed in order to be eligible for prizes.
data.value: Correo electrónico y su número de teléfono no son necesario, sin embargo, va a necesitar al menos uno para poder recibir los premios.
data.comment: Explanation about contact information being necessary to win prizes.

data.name: Enter {0} read
data.comment: Dashboard entry of activity performed, {0} is plural (for example "minutes" or "pages")

data.name: Events
data.comment: Navigation bar link to Events

data.name: First Name
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's first name (given name, forename, Christian name)

data.name: Forgot Password
data.comment: Title of the page for sending a participant their password recovery link

data.name: Forgot your password?
data.comment: Link for a participant to click if they've forgotten their password

data.name: Forgot your username?
data.comment: Link for a participant to click if they've forgotten their username

data.name: Home
data.comment: Navigation bar link to home page

data.name: Homeschooled
data.comment: A school type - homeschooled

data.name: I read a book!
data.comment: Dashboard button for logging activity of reading one book

data.name: I will {0}
data.comment: Daily personal goal, an explanation of activity, {0} is the action such as "read". See '{0} a day' for completion of this sentence - when combined they will say something similar to "I will read _ minutes a day"

data.name: Is this your first time participating?
data.comment: Prompt for a participant about if this is their first time participating in the program.

data.name: This website relies on JavaScript. Please enable JavaScript in your browser to get the best experience.
data.value: Este sitio web es basado en JavaScript. Por favor, active JavaScript en su navegador para obtener la mejor experiencia.
data.comment: Text to display if the user's browser does not have JavaScript functional

data.name: Join
data.comment: Navigation bar link or page title for join/sign up

data.name: Join!
data.comment: Text of the button to create a participant account

data.name: Language
data.comment: Navigation bar drop-down for language selection

data.name: Last Name
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's last name (surname, family name)

data.name: Log {0}
data.comment: Dashboard submit button for activity performed, {0} is plural (for example "minutes" or "pages")

data.name: Mail
data.comment: Navigation bar link to in-software mail facility

data.name: Menu
data.comment: Text for display when the window is small to expand the top navigation bar

data.name: Mission Control
data.comment: Navigation bar link to system administration area (colloquially how NASA refers to the mission control center/operations center)

data.name: My Profile
data.comment: Navigation bar link to the participant's user profile

data.name: New Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's new password

data.name: No
data.comment: No, negative response to inquiry

data.name: Once the program starts, you will enter your activity right here!
data.value: En cuanto comience el programa, ¡Entrara su actividad aquí!
data.comment: Dashboard explanation that the program hasn't started yet and what to do once it has

data.name: Participate in program activities to earn badges!
data.value: ¡Participe en las actividades del programa para ganar credenciales!
data.comment: Dashboard text displayed when the participant has no badges.

data.name: Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's password to access the system.

data.name: Password and password confirmation do not match.
data.value: La contraseña y la confirmación de su contraseña no coinciden.
data.comment: Validation prompt explaining that the password and password confirmation fields do not match.

data.name: Password Recovery
data.comment: Title of the page for allowing a participant to reset their password

data.name: Permission denied.
data.comment: General message when a participant does not have permission to execute an action.

data.name: Phone Number
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's telephone number

data.name: Please correct the issues with your password.
data.value: Por favor corrija los problemas con su contraseña.
data.comment: Validation prompt if there are issues with the participant's password on the join form.

data.name: Please let us know if this is your first time participating in the program.
data.value: Por favor déjenos saber si esta es su primera vez participando en el programa.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select whether or not this is their first time participating in the program.

data.name: Please let us know if you would like to receive emails throughout the program.
data.value: Por favor déjenos saber si desea recibir mensajes de correo electrónico durante todo el programa.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select whether or not they want to receive periodic emails during the program.

data.name: Please select a branch.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select a library branch.

data.name: Please select a program.
data.comment: Validation prompt if no value was selected for the program from a drop-down and it's required, examples might be 'Adult' or 'Teen' - the context is that of a summer or winter library reading program

data.name: Please select a system.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select a library system.

data.name: Please select a value for {0}.
data.value: Por favor seleccione un valor para {0}.
data.comment: No value was selected for the field and it's required, {0} is the field name (such as 'System' or 'Branch')

data.name: Private School
data.comment: A school type - private school

data.name: Program
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's program selection from a drop-down list, examples might be 'Adult' or 'Teen' - the context is that of a summer or winter library reading program

data.name: Public School
data.comment: A school type - public school

data.name: Registration for {0} is not open yet.
data.value: Registración para {0} aún no está abierta.
data.comment: Alert shown to a participant if they attempt to join prior to registration opening for the program; {0} is the name of the program

data.name: Reset Password
data.comment: Button to save a participant's new password

data.name: Return to Sign In
data.comment: Button to take a participant back to the sign in page

data.name: School
data.comment: Prompt for the name of the participant's school

data.name: School District
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's school district

data.name: School not listed
data.comment: Prompt for a participant indicating their school is not listed

data.name: School Type
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's school type

data.name: Secret Code
data.comment: Dashboard prompt for entering a secret code

data.name: See more of your badges in your history!
data.value: ¡Vea más de sus credenciales en su historial!
data.comment: Dashboard link to view participant's history, displayed underneath their badges

data.name: See your activity history.
data.comment: Dashboard link to view history of program activities

data.name: Send Recovery Email
data.comment: Button to send a user their username or password recovery email

data.name: Set a personal goal
data.comment: Prompt participant for a personal goal when participating in the program

data.name: Sign in
data.comment: Navigation bar link to sign in/authenticate

data.name: Sign out
data.comment: Navigation bar link to sign out

data.name: Someone has already chosen that username, please try another.
data.value: Alguien ya ha elegido ese nombre de usuario, por favor trate otro.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the username is already in use.

data.name: Step {0}
data.comment: Which step of a process we are on, {0} is replaced with a number like 1, 2, or 3

data.name: Submit Code
data.comment: Dashboard button to submit a secret code

data.name: System
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's library system from a drop-down list, examples might be 'Maricopa County Library District' or 'Phoenix Public Library'

data.name: That username is available!
data.value: Ese nombre de usuario está disponible!
data.comment: Validation prompt that the username selected is available.

data.name: The branch you've selected is not valid, please select another branch.
data.value: La sucursal que eligió no es válida, Por favor seleccioné otra sucursal.
data.comment: The participant has selected a branch that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a branch became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The program has ended, thanks for participating!
data.value: El programa ha terminado, ¡gracias por participar!
data.comment: Dashboard information about the program ending.

data.name: The program is not accepting registrations at this time.
data.value: El programa no está aceptando registración en este momento.
data.comment: A participant tried to sign up when the program was not open for sign-ups.

data.name: The program is not open for activity at this time.
data.value: El programa no está abierto para actividad en este momento.
data.comment: A participant tried to enter activity when the program was not permitting it.

data.name: The program you've selected is not valid, please select another program.
data.value: El programa que usted seleccionó no es válido, Por favor seleccione otro programa.
data.comment: The participant has selected a program that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a program became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The school you've selected is not valid, please select another school.
data.value: La escuela que usted selecciono no es válido, Por favor seleccione otra escuela.
data.comment: The participant has selected a school that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a school became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The system you've selected is not valid, please select another system.
data.value: El sistema que usted selecciono no es válido, por favor seleccione otro sistema.
data.comment: The participant has selected a system that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a system became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The {0} field is required.
data.value: Por favor proporcione un valor para {0}.
data.comment: No value was entered for the field and it's required, {0} is the field name (such as 'First Name')

data.name: This program may be better-suited to your age:
data.value: Este programa puede ser más adecuado para su edad:
data.comment: Validation prompt that the user should perhaps select another program - this text is followed by the name of the recommended program.

data.name: Title
data.comment: Dashboard prompt for entering a book title

data.name: To receive email updates please supply an email address to send them to.
data.value: Para recibir alertas por favor ingrese una dirección de correo electrónico para enviarlos.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant requested email updates but neglected to provide an email address.

data.name: Toggle navigation
data.comment: Text for screen readers when the window is small to expand the top navigation when it is collapsed

data.name: Token
data.comment: A set of characters that a participant enters to verify their identity, typically alphanumeric

data.name: Username
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's unique username which is used to access the system.

data.name: Username Recovery
data.comment: Title of the page for sending a participant their username if they've forgotten it

data.name: Validate code
data.comment: Text of the button used to validate an Authorization Code

data.name: Welcome {0}!
data.comment: Dashboard friendly greeting, {0} is the participant's first name

data.name: Yes
data.comment: Yes, positive response to inquiry

data.name: You can join {0} on {1}.
data.comment: Alert shown to a participant if they attempt to join prior to the start of the program; {0} is the name of the program, {1} is a the date the program starts

data.name: You have {0} points.
data.comment: Dashboard display of current points, {0} is a number of points they've earned

data.name: Your badges
data.comment: Dashboard link to view participant's history, displayed above their badges on the dashboard

data.name: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and include a number.
data.value: Su contraseña debe de ser por lo menos de 6 caracteres de largo y que incluya un número.
data.comment: Password requirements shown to participants.

data.name: Zip Code
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's zip code or postal code

data.name: {0} - Join Now!
data.comment: Page title/call to action for joining; {0} is the name of the program

data.name: {0} a day
data.comment: Daily personal goal, completion of sentence, {0} is a plural activity description such as "minutes". See 'I will {0}' for the first half of this sentence - when combined they will say something similar to "I will read _ minutes a day"

data.name: {0} has ended, please join us next time!
data.value: {0} ha terminado, por favor únase a nosotros la próxima vez!
data.comment: Alert shown to a participant if they access after the program has ended; {0} is the name of the program

data.name: A list of usernames associated with the email address '{0}' has been sent.
data.value: Una lista de nombres de usuario asociados con la dirección de correo electrónico '{0}' ha sido enviada.
data.comment: Informing the user that a list of usernames email has been sent; {0} is the associated email address

data.name: A password recovery email has been sent to the email for username '{0}'.
data.value: Un correo electrónico de recuperación de contraseña ha sido enviada al correo electrónico para el nombre de usuario'{0}'.
data.comment: Informing the user that a password recovery email has been sent; {0} is their username

data.name: Could not recover username(s): {0}
data.value: No se pudo recuperar el nombre de usuario(s): {0}
data.comment: A username recovery email could not be sent for the reason specified in {0}

data.name: Password reset for: {0}
data.comment: Telling the user that their password was reset, {0} is their username

data.name: Password reset token '{0}' has expired, please start the password reset process over.
data.value: Token para cambiar la contraseña '{0}' se ha vencido, por favor comience el proceso de restablecimiento de contraseña otra vez.
data.comment: Password reset token has expired because the user waited too long between asking to reset their password and clicking the link. They must restart the password reset process and generate a new token.

data.name: Password reset token '{0}' is not valid, please start the password reset process over.
data.value: Token para cambiar la contraseña '{0}' no es válido, por favor comience el proceso de restablecimiento de contraseña otra vez.
data.comment: Password reset token is not valid, they must restart the password reset process and generate a new token.

data.name: The program is not accepting sign-ins at this time.
data.value: El programa no está aceptando inicios de sesión en este momento.
data.comment: A participant tried to sign in when the program was not open for sign-ins.

data.name: The provided password is incorrect.
data.comment: Validation prompt that the user entered an invalid password.

data.name: There are no usernames associated with the email address: {0}.
data.value: No hay nombres de usuario asociados a la dirección de correo electrónico: {0}.
data.comment: An attempt was made to find usernames associated with an email address and none were found; {0} is the email address that was searched for

data.name: Unable to reset password: {0}
data.value: No se puede restablecer la contraseña: {0}
data.comment: Telling the user why their password could not be reset, {0} is the explanation

data.name: Username '{0}' does not have an email address configured.
data.value: Nombre de usuario'{0}' no tiene una dirección de correo electrónico configurado.
data.comment: The user does not have an email address configured so we cannot email them to perform a password reset; {0} is their username

data.name: Please enter a whole number greater than 0.
data.value: Por favor ingrese un número entero mayor que 0.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant entered a non-integer, number less than 0, or 0.

data.name: When providing an author of a book, please also provide a title.
data.value: Al proporcionar un autor de un libro, también proporcione un título.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant entered an author but not the title of a book.

data.name: Sorry, we couldn't log your activity: {0}
data.value: Lo sentimos, no pudimos registrar tu actividad: {0}
data.comment: Due to a software problem, the participant's activity could not be saved.

data.name: Thanks! We'll let you know when you can join the program.
data.value: ¡Gracias! Nosotros le dejaremos saber cuándo pueda participar en el programa.
data.comment: Inform the participant that we will email them when they can participate in the program.

data.name: The field {0} must be a string or array type with a maximum length of '{1}'.
data.value: Por favor ingrese menos de {1} carácter para {0}.
data.comment: Validation prompt that a particular field - name replaces {0} - has a maximum allowed length of characters - replaced by {1}.

data.name: The field {0} must be a string or array type with a minimum length of '{1}'.
data.value: Por favor ingrese más que {1} carácter para {0}.
data.comment: Validation prompt that a particular field - name replaces {0} - has a minimum allowed length of characters - replaced by {1}.

data.name: The {0} field is not a valid e-mail address.
data.value: El {0} campo no es una dirección de correo electrónico válida.
data.comment: Validation prompt for an invalid email address.

data.name: The {0} field is not a valid phone number.
data.value: El {0} campo no es un número de teléfono valido.
data.comment: Validation prompt for an invalid telephone number.

data.name: Join Now!
data.comment: Shown on top of join page as participant signs up for the program after the name of the program and a hyphen (e.g. "The Great Reading Adventure - <this message>")

data.name: My progress
data.comment: Display prior to progress bar showing the participant's progress in the program

data.name: Final Step
data.comment: Text inside a button to indicate clicking takes the user to the last step of a multi-step process.

data.name: Next Step
data.comment: Text inside a button to indicate clicking takes the user to the next step of a multi-step process. Often pictured next to a right arrow.

data.name: The password you've provided is too short, it must be at least {0} characters long.
data.value: La contraseña que ha proporcionado es demasiado corta, debe de ser por lo menos {0} chárteres de largo.
data.comment: Password provided is two short, {0} will be replaced with the required number of characters.

data.name: You must include a lowercase letter in your password.
data.value: Debe incluir una letra minúscula en su contraseña.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain a lowercase letter and must contain at least one.

data.name: You must include a number in your password.
data.value: Debes incluir un número en tu contraseña.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain a digit and must contain at least one.

data.name: You must include a special character in your password.
data.value: Debes incluir un carácter especial en tu contraseña.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain any symbols (e.g. !, @, #) and must contain at least one.

data.name: You must include an uppercase letter in your password.
data.value: Debes incluir una letra mayúscula en tu contraseña.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain an uppercase letter and must contain at least one.

data.name: The goal of this program is {0} points.
data.value: El objetivo de este programa es {0} puntos.
data.comment: Inform the user how many points are required to reach the goal of the program, {0} is replaced with a number of points.

data.name: The username and password entered do not match.
data.value: El nombre de usuario y la contraseña ingresados no coinciden.
data.comment: Prompt the user that the username and password entered are not accurate.

data.name: Sign in to {0}
data.comment: Prompt a user to sign in to the site, {0} is replaced with the name of the site
